com.smtp
Class SMTPPostfixOutputConnector

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.stats.StoppableThread
          com.smtp.SMTPPostfixOutputConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SMTPPostfixOutputConnector
extends StoppableThread

Connect to the smtpd instance of Postfix to send back messages. Messages and their envelopes are written to an input stream read by the SMTPPostfixOutputConnector.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli
